text: Bacterial , fungal , and mycobacterial cultures of endotracheal aspirates and BAL fluid were performed . Respiratory viruses were tested by a multiplex reverse - transcription polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) assay using a Seeplex RV15 ACE Detection kit ( Seegene Inc . , Seoul , Korea ) and / or shell vial culture . PCR to detect Mycoplasma pneumoniae , Chlamydophila pneumoniae , and Legionella pneumophila , and a urinary antigen test to detect Streptococcus pneumoniae and L . pneumophilia serogroup 1 species were also performed .
